item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure NetApp Files Object REST API
item.description:
Azure NetApp Files is offering a Public Preview of an Object REST API â€” an S3-compatible REST API that lets customers bridge traditional file-based storage and modern cloud services, enabling reuse of existing data and integration with Microsoft Fabric.

  • Source: Azure Updates
